description.p: Defines the number of rows to display in the Grid before alternating to the odd row color.

discussion.p: When *[ui:Alternate Row Shading]* is enabled, the *[ui:Even row band size]* property is shown. This property defines the number of rows to display using the even row color before alternating to the odd row color. The even row color is the alternate background color for rows in a Grid.
See [Alternate Row Shading] for more information about customizing the row colors.
